| Overview                = The '''Warriors of the Deadly Staff''' are the foot soldiers representing the [[House of the Deadly Staff]], one of the five Houses of the [[Five Weapons Society (Earth-616)|Five Weapons Society]].  As an homage to the namesake [[Deadly Warriors (Earth-616)|Deadly Warrior]], the Warriors of the Deadly Staff are dressed in green and utilize staved weapons.  
| History                 = After [[Zheng Shi-Hua (Earth-616)|Sister Hammer]] usurped control of the Society from [[Brother Staff (Earth-616)|Brother Staff]], the Warriors of the Deadly Staff fearfully pledge their loyalty to her.  In order to consolidate her rule, Hammer dispatches several Warriors to assassinate the Society's legitimate ruler, [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]].{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 1}}  After Sister Hammer is ousted from the Society and Shang-Chi is named the new Supreme Commander, the Warriors of the Deadly Staff swear fealty to him.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 5}}
